00041 bool CPrimitiveTypesSerializer::SerializeIndex(iser::IArchive& archive, istd::TIndex<Dimensions>& index)
00042 {
00043        bool retVal = true;
00044 
00045        for (int i = 0; i < Dimensions; ++i){

00047        }
00048 
00049        return retVal;
